message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="editor" color="purple" summary="Noted amendment, waiting for team-lead assignment">
Thanks for flagging the Essay 3 probe wording. I have the amendment noted ("as you moved through the essay's examples" instead of "across the three examples"). However, I'm currently waiting for team-lead to assign me a specific task before I make any edits. I'll incorporate it when the protocol document comes to me.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Understood. I think you may have me confused with another teammate -- I don't believe I sent that Essay 3 probe wording flag. But glad it's noted regardless. Standing by on my end as well.
input.summary: Clarification: didn't send that flag, standing by
